ISSUE.TITLE: Allow json token as parameter name in recipe
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currenty in recipes you can only use simple json parameter names passed in as parameter to parameters function eg ``` "Text": "[js: parameters('FirstName')]" ``` I would like to use complex json names like ``` "Text": "[js: parameters('Properties.FirstName')]" "Text": "[js: parameters('Properties.LastName')]" ``` my recipe I want to use looks like this : ``` "LandingPage": { "FullName": { "Text": "[js: parameters('Properties.FirstName')]" }, "ProfessionalTitle": { "Text": "[js: parameters('Properties.ProfessionalTitle')]" } }, ``` submitting a pr to support this.
